item.title: Amanda add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The way I figure it, everyone gets a miracle. Like, I will probably never be struck by lightening, or win a Nobel Prize, or become the dictator of a small nation in the Pacific Islands, or contract terminal ear cancer, or spontaneously combust. But if you consider all the unlikely things together, at least one of them will probably happen to each of us. I could have seen it rain frogs. I could have stepped foot on Mars. I could have been eaten by a whale. I could have married the Queen of England or survived months at sea. But my miracle was different. My miracle was this: out of all the houses in all the subdivisions in all of Florida, I ended up living next door to Margo Roth Spiegelman." -- John Green

item.title: Amanda add a quote by L.K. Madigan
item.description: "The main thing is to WRITE. Some days it might be 2000 words. Some days you might tinker with two sentences until you get them just right. Both days belong in the writing life. Some days you may watch a ‘Doctor Who’ marathon or become immersed in a book that is so good you can’t stop reading. Some days you may be in love or in mourning. Those days belong in the writing life, too. Live them without guilt." -- L.K. Madigan

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Diana Tixier Herald
item.description: "No two people ever read the same book." -- Diana Tixier Herald

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "It's still magic even if you know how it's done." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Megan Crewe
item.description: "You learn a lot when you know no one else is going to do things for you." -- Megan Crewe

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "Do your thing and don't care if they like it." -- Tina Fey

item.title: Amanda add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Kindred spirits are not so scarce as I used to think. It's splendid to find out there are so many of them in the world." -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami
